p: At the end of the baseline period, participants filled out an online survey through Qualtrics (Qualtrics, Provo, UT) measuring: A) 11 psychological factors (1. affective engagement, 2. collective efficacy, 3. perceived behavioural control, 4. social norm, 5. faith in institutions, 6. self-efficacy, 7. identity, 8. attitudes, 9. intentions, 10. openness/imagination, 11. theory of change), B) self-reported activism behaviour and C) demographics (figure 1c).
